title: Racing The Nürburgring - Leh Keen 'Rain Dance' Interview - /SHAKEDOWN
description:
Sports car racer, Leh Keen, and /DRIVE brought you his 'Rain Dance' video - A lap of the 2013 Nurburgring 24, in the rain, at night. This may be the Best. Video. Ever! - To capture the true and challenging essence of sportscar racing. Other sports and motorsport may boast of their 'Extremes', but Leh Keen shows all that HE, a Porsche, and the Nurburgring make for 'The Real Deal'.

Leo Parente and ShakeDown follow-up with Leh to get his thoughts about the 'Rain Dance' experience that was his awesome driving, racing, and car control behind the wheel of his Farnbacher Racing Porsche 997 GT3 R, SP9 class, race car. Plus, Leh Keen shares his secrets on going fast in the rain. And much more.

This video is the perfect complement to his 'Rain Dance' lap.

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WAvN0EzEacU
Leh Keen's Rain Dance - 24 Hours Nürburgring - DRIVER'S EYE

http://lehkeen.com/
Leh Keen website

http://www.24h-rennen.de/en/
2013 Nurburgring 24 website

http://www.porsche.com/usa/eventsandracing/motorsport/racingcars/911gt3r-997/
2013 Porsche 997 GT3 R racecar

http://blog.axisofoversteer.com/2013/05/1010ths-blind-in-soggy-green-hell.html
Axis of Oversteer
